title: SPIRIT
description:
The quote, "The difference between heaven and hell is perspective" has been quoted endlessly, but have you ever thought about it?

==================================================================================

In this torrent are 8 unrelated texts, ranging from poetry, metaphysics, western and eastern religions... all containing a similar message: that you how feel, how you've been conditioned to interpret situations, all the faulty ideas and judgements ultimately are on your shoulders. The great news is that, once aware of this, these are entirely open to being changed! Why live in an emotional hell once you realize that what we're doing to ourselves - and each other - is actually a choice?

==================================================================================

The same message is in countless movies, popular books, religion and philosophies, modern day therapy... I've even recently seen it in a children's animated cartoon somebody showed me called "Neon Genesis Evangelion" (?) in it's last 3 episodes. It's all out there, scattered across mainstream culture.

==================================================================================

Here's a simple 2-step summary:

1) Awareness that the suffering we 'experience' really comes from within us.
2) Realization that we can alter our perspectives, our outlook on life itself.

==================================================================================

I just wanted to share some books that have helped me out. 

After 16 years of searching, I found a way out of chronic suicidal depression.

I'm not trying to be preachy, just hoping to pass it on. None of these books in

in particular (except the Tao) had something that crucially helped, but they all 

hold the same signposts.

==================================================================================
